tree.name: Kyrie Irving
tree.note: Traded from Brooklyn to Dallas with Markieff Morris

assetsGivenUp.name: Spencer Dinwiddie
assetsGivenUp.note: Traded from Washington to Dallas with Davis Bertans for Kristaps Porzingis and a 2022 2nd round pick

assetsGivenUp.name: Kristaps Porzingis
assetsGivenUp.note: Traded from New York to Dallas with Tim Hardaway Jr., Courtney Lee, and Trey Burke for Dennis Smith Jr., DeAndre Jordan, Wesley Matthews, and 2 future 1st round picks

assetsGivenUp.name: Dennis Smith Jr.
assetsGivenUp.note: NC State guard, drafted 9th overall by Dallas

assetsGivenUp.name: DeAndre Jordan
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed as free agent from LA Clippers

assetsGivenUp.name: 2021 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Unprotected, conveyed to New York as #21 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Top-10 protected, did not convey in 2023, rolled to 2024 as #24 overall to New York

assetsGivenUp.name: 2022 DAL 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2022 second-round pick, sent to Washington as #54 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: Dorian Finney-Smith
assetsGivenUp.note: Florida forward, signed by Dallas as undrafted free agent in 2016

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 DAL 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2029 first-round pick, sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2027 DAL 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2027 second-round pick, sent to Brooklyn

assetsGivenUp.name: 2029 DAL 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Dallas own 2029 second-round pick, sent to Brooklyn
